summary: AIR BAG LIGHT STAYS ON. SCANNER SAYS DO NOT DRIVE. PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG.  CALLED GM AND THEY SAID THERE ARE NO RECALLS ON AIR BAGS. I NOTICED THAT THERE WAS A SIMILAR PROBLEM WITH THE 1999 AIR BAGS ON DRIVERS SIDE. HAS ANYONE ELSE HAD A COMPLAINT? THE AIR BAGS SHOULD HAVE A LIFETIME WARRANTY. *JB
